CWEs: CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
description: The function getSizeFromRatio uses the math.eval function to evaluate a string as a mathematical expression. This can lead to code injection if the 'ratio' property of the 'options' object is controlled by an attacker. An attacker could provide a string that includes arbitrary JavaScript code, which would then be executed when the math.eval function is called.
